name: Path to Tribute
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare 48. The theme was "deeper and deeper", in this game you go deeper and deeper into the forest.

NOTE: Web build may have some bugs? I did not test it completely yet!

Controls

Either mouse and buttons on screen, or keyboard and mouse:

  • Left click to place jobs to chop wood or build buildings (jobs are automatic)
  • Right click to remove current selection (if you don’t want to build/remove something but have it selected)
  • Hold Ctrl while placing buildings to place more!!!
  • You can hold the left click (while holding ctrl) for ultra fast placing, also you can hold down left click to continue placing cutting jobs as well
  • 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 shortcuts for various buildings (you’ll see in game)
  • H for help
  • C to remove (when you see the big red X, click and everything is erased (jobs and buildings))
  • Middle mouse hold and move mouse to move camera OR W, A, S D, to move camera
  • M to mute music

Monsters

  • Wolf - probably won’t get to your tower
  • Bear - probably will get to the tower and take a bite
  • Treant - didn’t test it, good luck 

Buildings

  • Road (5 wood, 5 gold) - it leads to victory
  • Main Camp (0 wood, 15 gold) - you can’t do anything without it (it’s THE main camp after all)
  • Worker House (10 wood, 10 gold) - a new worker chills here
  • Trading Post (40 wood, 15 gold) - Who needs gold?
  • Forward Camp (20 wood, 10 gold) - What time is it?
  • Tower Template (10 wood, 5 gold) - For pacifists (I didn’t have time to mark their range, or make their animation… 5 tiles)

Tips

  • Towers take a worker - permanently (he lives there now)
  • Workers take 1 gold for a job (greedy workers)
  • Build the trading post before you go out of money
  • Jobs take more time depending on the distance from your camp (I didn’t specify which one )

Update 1: bugfixes related to restarting and main camp removal
